name: Alms Box
description: A small box for religious donations, typically found in a priest's pack.

name: Backpack
description: A backpack is a leather pack carried on the back, typically with straps to secure it.

name: Barrel
description: A heavy wooden barrel banded with iron.

name: Bottle, glass
description: A glass bottle used for storing liquids.

name: Bottle, crystal
description: A crystal bottle used for storing potions.

name: Flask
description: A metal flask used for storing drinking liquid.

name: Keg
description: A lighter wooden barrel, usually used for storing liquids or black powder.

name: Pot
description: A heavy iron pot used for cooking.

name: Vial
description: A small glass vial, used for storing liquids.

name: Waterskin
description: A leather pouch with a drinking spout. A waterskin full of water weighs 5 lbs.
